title: Don't Worry, Eat Happy
description:
Tomme Beevas loves bringing people together through food at his restaurant in Minneapolis. But when his city shuts down, he finds a new way to serve-- one that helps the community heal.

Visit Pimento Jamaican Kitchen

Follow Pimento Jamaican Kitchen on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile”by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
